boat.name: Mermaid
boat.full_description:
Mermaid was originally built for racing and raced again at the Falmouth Classics in 2018 following her rebuild. 

In 1997 Mermaid was purchased when she was a near wreck and taken to Derby for rebuilding her hull, deck and cabin. Mermaid was then sent to Ocean Yacht Company for completion which included mast, spars, rigging and installing a single engine with hydraulic drive to twin props.
boat.construction_details: Carvel pitch pine on oak frames
boat.short_description: Built in 1860, Mermaid was found as a wreck in 1997 and rebuilt to race again in Falmouth, 2018.  Mermaid is at Gweek Classic Boatyard.

for_sales.sales_text:
Mermaid was originally built for racing and raced again at the Falmouth Classics in 2018 following her rebuild. 

In 1997 we bought Mermaid when she was a near wreck. We brought her to Derby where Chris worked on rebuilding her hull, deck and cabin. Mermaid was then sent to Ocean Yacht Company for completion which included mast, spars, rigging and installing a single engine with hydraulic drive to twin props. Mermaid is now sold.
